00121    /*
00122    * Serialize to/from an archive. 
00123    */
00124    template <class Archive>
00125    void AtomMSD::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00126    {
00127       if (!isInitialized_) {
00128          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized.");
00129       }
00130 
00131       ar & accumulator_;
00132       ar & truePositions_;
00133       ar & oldPositions_;

00135       ar & nMolecule_;
00136 
00137       serializeCheck(ar, speciesId_, "speciesId");
00138       serializeCheck(ar, atomId_, "atomId");
00139       serializeCheck(ar, capacity_, "capacity");
00140 
00141    }
